title: Save! Save! Save! Amazing rates on 2 BRs. A steal at $1935!
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at IMT Deerfield, located at 13125 Morris Road Alpharetta, GA 30004.', 'Description', '........', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Exceptional beauty and style are waiting for you at IMT Deerfield.', 'Each one, two and three-bedroom apartment home comes with a wide range of modern must-haves including walk-in closets, spacious kitchens and sophisticated upgrades.', 'Enjoy long soaks in your garden-style oval tub or relax with morning coffee on your breezy private patio.', "With three resort-style pools, two lighted tennis courts, a 6000 SF state-of-the-art fitness center, fully-equipped clubhouse, playground and car care center, IMT Deerfield doesn't hold back when it comes to top-tier amenities.", 'This is the convenience you deserve.', 'The luxury you deserve.', 'Come home to IMT Deerfield.', "Conveniently located near many shops and restaurants at Avalon and in Alpharetta, and only minutes away from North Fulton's primary employment concentrations, upscale shopping, excellent school systems and Georgia 400, you will find that the lifestyle you've always desired is right outside your front door, with downtown Atlanta within reach.", 'show contact info', 'Bedrooms', '........... 2', 'Bathrooms', '......... 2', 'Sq Footage', '......... 1214 - 1266 sq ft', 'Unit Price', '........... $1935/Month', 'Lease Term', '........', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Amenity List', '......', '◾ Car Care Center', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Common Area Wi-Fi', '◾ Detached Garage(s)', '◾ Emergency Maintenance', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Gated Access', '◾ Pet Park', '◾ Shopping Nearby', '◾ Tennis Court(s)', '◾ 6,000 Sq.', 'Ft. State-of-the-Art Fitness Center', "◾ Children's Playground", '◾ Complimentary Aerobics & Tennis Lessons', '◾ Excellent School System', '◾ Executive Business Center', '◾', 'My IMT Resident Portal', '◾ Online Resident Services: service requests & account information', '◾ Resident Clubhouse', '◾ Two Car Care Centers', '◾ Valet Trash Service', 'Unit Features', '.....', '◾ Covered Private Patio, Balcony, or Enclosed Sunroom', '◾ Crown Molding Accents', '◾ Dramatic Nine-Foot Ceilings', '◾ Expansive Pass-Thru Breakfast Bars', '◾ Garden-Style Oval Tub', '◾ Granite Countertops', '◾', 'In-Home Washers & Dryers', '◾ Spacious Pantries', '◾ White Shaker Cabinetry', '◾ Wood-Style Flooring Throughout', 'Our Pet Policy', '...', 'No weight restriction.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our Leasing Center for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Leasing Hours', '...', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Call our Office', '... at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a private tour today.', 'Our Location', '.....', '13125 Morris Road', 'Alpharetta, GA 30004', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Professionally managed by IMT Residential', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'E6DA30D3E1FE455']
